events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on April 28th involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorized as an Auto Accident claim following the description of a vehicle collision and damages.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the case to ensure prompt processing.
The claim notification was formally acknowledged and the insured was advised of the next steps in the investigation.
Requested vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the collision damage to support claim assessment.
The insured promptly submitted all requested documents including the police report and clear photographs of the accident scene.
Investigation commenced to verify liability and assess damage extent based on submitted documentation and statements.
The investigation concluded confirming the insured's claim details and establishing fault with the other driver.
A settlement offer was made to cover damages and repair costs for the vehicle involved in the collision.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the clear communication and timely handling of the vehicle accident claim.
Approval was given for the settlement amount covering all valid expenses related to the vehicle collision.
Payment of the approved claim amount was successfully issued and transferred to the insuredâ€™s account.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that all payout and administrative tasks were completed.
All claim files and documentation were securely archived according to company policy for future reference.
